TextView.android:text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
– Thomas A. Edison
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
– Marie Curie
Sometimes it is not enough to do our best; we must do what is required.
– Winston Churchill
I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Valuable advice can sometimes come from an unexpected source, and chance events can sometimes open new doors.
– Narayana Murthy
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
– Napoleon Hill
You renew yourself every day. Sometimes you’re successful, sometimes you’re not, but it’s the average that counts.
– Satya Nadella
It does not matter how many times you get knocked down, but how many times you get up.
– Vince Lombardi
They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
– Andy Warhol
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
– Nelson Mandela
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
– Thomas A. Edison
When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
– Maya Angelou
Over time, the hurt doesn’t hurt. Only regret does.
– Terri Guillemets
In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
– Anthony J. D’Angelo
A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
– Henry Van Dyke
You have enemies? Good. That means you’ve stood up for something, sometime in your life.
– Winston Churchill
We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
– John F. Kennedy
Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith.
– Steve Jobs
Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
– Warren Buffett
Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
– Auguste Rodin
A moment’s insight is sometimes worth a life’s experience.
– Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Sometimes it’s the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
– Keri Russell
Sometimes by losing a battle, you find a new way to win the war.
– Donald Trump
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him a lifetime.
– Maimonides
Success is simple. Do what’s right, the right way, at the right time.
– Arnold H. Glasow
People won’t have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
– Stephen Hawking
It takes a long time to become young.
– Pablo Picasso
Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
– Maya Angelou
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
– Theodore Roosevelt
Leadership does not depend on being right.
– Ivan Illich
Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
– Khalil Gibran
The only journey is the one within.
– Rainer Maria Rilke
Never look backward or you’ll fall down the stairs.
– Rudyard Kipling
Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
– Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
– Amelia Barr
I believe much trouble would be saved if we opened out hearts more.
– Chief Joseph
The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
– Arnold J. Toynbee
You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.
– Indira Gandhi
The only solutions that are ever worth anything are the solutions that people find themselves.
– Satyajit Ray
An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
– Mahatma Gandhi
There are many things that, if I have to relive, maybe I will do it another way. But I would not like to look back and think what I have not been able to.
– Ratan Tata
Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
All birds find shelter during a rain. But eagle avoids rain by flying above the clouds.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
Without your involvement, you can’t succeed. With your involvement, you can’t fail.
-A P J Abdul Kalam
Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
It is very easy to defeat someone, but it is very hard to win someone.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
Dream, Dream, Dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can’t help them, at least, don’t hurt them.
– Dalai Lama
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
– Buddha
Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways, yet each one can be true.
– Swami Vivekananda
First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.
– Mahatma Gandhi
Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
– A P J Abdul Kalam
Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
– John F. Kennedy
There’s always some room for improvisation.
– Satyajit Ray
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
– Theodore Roosevelt
If there is one place on the face of earth where all the dreams of living men have found a home from the very earliest days when man began the dream of existence, it is India.
– Nobel Laureate Romain Rolland
Bombs and pistols do not make a revolution. The sword of revolution is sharpened on the whetting-stone of ideas.
– Bhagat Singh
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
– Alfred A. Montapert
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
– William Butler Yeats
When an idea exclusively occupies the mind, it is transformed into an actual physical or mental state.
– Swami Vivekananda
The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
– Thomas Paine
Sleep is the best meditation.
– Dalai Lama
If you can dream it, you can do it.
– Walt Disney
One finds limits by pushing them.
– Herbert Simon
Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
– Dr. A P J Abdul Kalam
Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
– Dr. A P J Abdul Kalam
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
– Mary Pickford
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
– Napoleon Hill
If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
– H. G. Wells
